languages.text: Несли с собой пришлецы мирские тщеты и нестроение, а возможно, яко и зерна кощунства прельстивого, аще поганые тати хоронились среди них.
The interlopers brought with them worldly futility and strife — and mayhap also the seeds of alluring blasphemies, if fiendly heathens lurked in their midst.
languages.original_text: Несли с собой пришлецы мирские тщеты и нестроение, а возможно, яко и зерна кощунства прельстивого, аще поганые тати хоронились среди них.

traits.locale_text: The interlopers brought with them worldly futility and strife — and mayhap also the seeds of alluring blasphemies, if fiendly heathens lurked in their midst.
The interlopers brought with them worldly futility and strife — and mayhap also the seeds of alluring blasphemies, if fiendly heathens lurked in their midst.
The interlopers brought with them worldly futility and strife — and mayhap also the seeds of alluring blasphemies, if fiendly heathens lurked in their midst.
The interlopers brought with them worldly futility and strife — and mayhap also the seeds of alluring blasphemies, if fiendly heathens lurked in their midst.
The interlopers brought with them worldly futility and strife — and mayhap also the seeds of alluring blasphemies, if fiendly heathens lurked in their midst.

languages.text: Los intrusos trajeron consigo la futilidad y los conflictos del mundo... y posiblemente la simiente de unas tentadoras blasfemias, si entre ellos había algún hereje diabólico.
languages.original_text: The interlopers brought with them worldly futility and strife — and mayhap also the seeds of alluring blasphemies, if fiendly heathens lurked in their midst.

traits.locale_text: Los intrusos trajeron consigo la futilidad y los conflictos del mundo... y posiblemente la simiente de unas tentadoras blasfemias, si entre ellos había algún hereje diabólico.

languages.text: 这些外来者带来了世俗的徒劳与纷争。如果恶魔异端潜伏在他们之中，他们或许还会带来亵渎的种子，诱人踏上邪路。
languages.original_text: The interlopers brought with them worldly futility and strife — and mayhap also the seeds of alluring blasphemies, if fiendly heathens lurked in their midst.

traits.locale_text: 这些外来者带来了世俗的徒劳与纷争。如果恶魔异端潜伏在他们之中，他们或许还会带来亵渎的种子，诱人踏上邪路。

languages.text: 侵入者達は、世俗的で無駄と争いをもたらした…そして、その中に危険な異教徒が潜んでいたとしたら、魅力的な冒涜の種も持ち込んでしまったのだろう。
languages.original_text: The interlopers brought with them worldly futility and strife — and mayhap also the seeds of alluring blasphemies, if fiendly heathens lurked in their midst.

traits.locale_text: 侵入者達は、世俗的で無駄と争いをもたらした…そして、その中に危険な異教徒が潜んでいたとしたら、魅力的な冒涜の種も持ち込んでしまったのだろう。

languages.text: Die Eindringlinge brachten weltliche Nichtswürdigkeit und Zwist mit sich – und vielleicht auch den Samen verlockender Blasphemien, sofern bösartige Heiden in ihrer Mitte lauerten.
languages.original_text: The interlopers brought with them worldly futility and strife — and mayhap also the seeds of alluring blasphemies, if fiendly heathens lurked in their midst.

traits.locale_text: Die Eindringlinge brachten weltliche Nichtswürdigkeit und Zwist mit sich – und vielleicht auch den Samen verlockender Blasphemien, sofern bösartige Heiden in ihrer Mitte lauerten.

languages.text: Les intrus apportent avec eux les conflits et la futilité de ce bas monde, et peut-être même les graines du blasphème tentateur, pour peu que d'abominables païens se cachent dans leurs rangs.
languages.original_text: The interlopers brought with them worldly futility and strife — and mayhap also the seeds of alluring blasphemies, if fiendly heathens lurked in their midst.

traits.locale_text: Les intrus apportent avec eux les conflits et la futilité de ce bas monde, et peut-être même les graines du blasphème tentateur, pour peu que d'abominables païens se cachent dans leurs rangs.

languages.text: Mütecavizler, yanlarında anlamsız uğraşlarını, dünyevi çatışmalarını ve muhtemelen akıllarını çelip kâfirlerin saflarına girmelerine neden olan dinsizlik tohumlarını da getirdi.
languages.original_text: The interlopers brought with them worldly futility and strife — and mayhap also the seeds of alluring blasphemies, if fiendly heathens lurked in their midst.

traits.locale_text: Mütecavizler, yanlarında anlamsız uğraşlarını, dünyevi çatışmalarını ve muhtemelen akıllarını çelip kâfirlerin saflarına girmelerine neden olan dinsizlik tohumlarını da getirdi.
